mapper.select:
SELECT t3.equipmentno, t3.equipmenttypeid, t2.channel iChannel, t1.* FROM instrumentparamconfig t1 LEFT JOIN monitorinstrument t2 ON t1.instrumentno = t2.instrumentno LEFT JOIN monitorequipment t3 ON t2.equipmentno = t3.equipmentno WHERE t3.equipmentno in
#{eNo}

SELECT t1.equipmentno, t1.equipmenttypeid, t2.equipmenttypename, t4.* FROM monitorequipment t1 LEFT JOIN monitorequipmenttype t2 ON t1.equipmenttypeid = t2.equipmenttypeid LEFT JOIN monitorinstrument t3 ON t1.equipmentno = t3.equipmentno LEFT JOIN instrumentparamconfig t4 ON t3.instrumentno = t4.instrumentno LEFT JOIN hospitalequiment t5 ON t1.hospitalcode = t5.hospitalcode WHERE t1.hospitalcode = #{hospitalCode} AND t1.clientvisible = '1'

select t1.*, t2.instrumentconfigname from instrumentparamconfig t1 left join instrumentconfig t2 on t1.instrumentconfigid = t2.instrumentconfigid where t1. instrumentparamconfigNO in
#{configParamNo}

SELECT t3.* FROM monitorequipment t1 LEFT JOIN monitorinstrument t2 ON t1.equipmentno = t2.equipmentno LEFT JOIN instrumentparamconfig t3 ON t2.instrumentno = t3.instrumentno WHERE t1.hospitalcode = #{hospitalCode} AND t1.equipmenttypeid = #{equipmentTypeId}

SELECT t3.instrumentconfigName, t1.lowlimit, t1.highlimit, t1.style_min styleMin, t1.style_max styleMax FROM instrumentparamconfig t1 LEFT JOIN monitorinstrument t2 ON t1.instrumentno = t2.instrumentno LEFT JOIN instrumentconfig t3 ON t1.instrumentconfigid = t3.instrumentconfigid WHERE t2.equipmentno = #{equipmentNo}
